pages.text: imaan laane waalo ka karsaaz71 Allah ta’ala khud hai, wo unhe andhero se roushni ki taraf nikaal le jaata hai aur kaafiro ke auliya shayaateen hai, wo unhe roushni se nikaal kar andhero ki taraf le jaate hai, ye log jahannami hai jo hamesha osi mein pade rahenge

kya tu ne ose nahi dekha jo saltanath pa kar Ibraheem (alaihissalaam) se us ke rab ke baare mein jhagad raha tha, jab Ibraheem (alaihissalaam) ne kaha ke mera rab to wo hai jo jilaata72 hai aur maarta hai, wo kehne laga main bhi jilaata aur maarta hoon, Ibraheem (alaihissalaam) ne kaha Allah suraj ko mashriq ki taraf se le aata hai, tu ose maghrib ki jaanib se le aa, ab to wo kaafir bhoon-chuka reh gaya, aur Allah ta’ala zaalimo ko hidaayath nahi deta

ya us shaqs ke maanind73 ke jis ka guzar us basti par hoa jo chath ke bal aundhi padi hoyi thi,wo kehne laga us ki mauth ke baadh Allah ta’ala ose kis tarah zinda karega? to Allah ta’ala ne ose maar diya, sau saal ke liye phir ose uthaaya, pocha kitni muddat tujh par guzri? kehne laga ek din ya din ka kuch hissa, farmaaya balke tu sau saal tak raha, phir ab tu apne khaane pine ko dekh, ke bilkul qaraab nahi hoa, aur apne ghadhe ko bhi dekh, hum tujhe logo ke liye ek nishaani banaate hai, tu dekh ke hum haddiyo ko kis taraah uthaate hai phir un par gosht chadaate hai, jab ye sab zaaher ho chuka to kehne laga main jaanta hoon ke Allah ta’ala har cheez par qaadir hai
